data.name: distraction-free stackoverflow (and other stack*)
data.description:
Removes many information-less boxes from many sites of the stackexchange galaxy.
Also makes those sites read-only by hiding buttons and forms that are only meaningful for people having an account.
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("stackoverflow.com"), domain("superuser.com"), domain("serverfault.com"), domain("stackapps.com"), domain("stackexchange.com"), domain("askubuntu.com") {
body > .js-dismissable-hero, /* Top of the page */
#left-sidebar,
#hero-box, .hero-box,
#herobox, .herobox, aside.s-hero, aside.js-dismissable-hero,
#hero-content, .hero-content, .hero-container
,.clc-cp-lb, .clc-cp-sb, #hireme
,#chat-feature
,.newsletter-anon
,.everyonelovesstackoverflow
,#hot-network-questions
,[aria-label="ask new question"]
,form#post-form
,#js-gdpr-consent-banner /* Useless GDPR warning that requires accepting cookies */
,.theme-selector /* Banner at the top of the page */
{ display: none !important;}
}

data.name: Inoreader NO ADS - new card view
data.description:
Inoreader new Big card view with 4 tiles on any screen resolution. No ADS at all.

IMPORTANT DON`T USE ADBLOCK, ADS will be removed by css styles!!!

changelog:
fixed padding in list view
fixed issue with list and other type of view

data.name: ROBLOX: Colourization Theme
data.description:
This theme allows you to change ROBLOX's default grey/white colour into something better.

Works with ROBLOX's Light Theme and Dark Theme.

[TIP]: You can change the Colour in the 'Customise Settings' tab.


Join our Discord Server for new Themes, Updates, and more:
https://discord.me/-CELESTIAL

data.name: Older owa outlook web mail - dark
data.description:
Im not sure the version of exchange we run, but none of the owa styles here worked for me.
And yes i updated the regex to match our url.
Inverts and hue rotates images, so colors dont look too off
